urls.title: Chester-Le-Street De-culverting - Excellence Through Innovation - Pell Frischmann
urls.description: The Chester Burn runs through the Chester-Le-Street town centre, partially in a twin box culvert. Chester-Le-Street has a history of flooding with major events recorded in 1979, 1996 and 2012 due to surcharging of the long culvert beneath the town centre. The scheme has opened up a section of the culvert under the town centre […]

text:
Pell Frischmann is delighted to announce the Chester-Le-Street Alleviation scheme won the Medium Project of the Year at @ICE_NE's Robert Stephenson Awards 2021.

Congrats to our partners at: @esh_group, @DurhamCouncil & @EnvAgency.

For more: https://t.co/kiqkmutgvk
